name: AIKCT Engine Chatbot, ChatGPT, Gemini, GPT-4o Best AI Chatbot
author: KCT

sections.description:
The KCT AI plugin is a WordPress add-on designed to integrate AI capabilities into both the TinyMCE (TinyEditor) and Gutenberg editors.

AIKCT Engine Chatbot – Rewrite Content from Url

AIKCT : Youtube to Blog

Using AIKCT : 1 click generation tags, thumb, and comments..

AIKCT Engine Chatbot is a powerful WordPress plugin that integrates AI to assist administrators in creating, managing, and optimizing blog posts. This lightweight tool simplifies the content creation process and enhances SEO strategies, ensuring your website’s content is always on point and optimized.
Features

Automatic Tag Generation
AI analyzes your content and suggests relevant tags to optimize searchability and post categorization.

Comment Suggestions
The plugin generates AI-driven comment suggestions based on your blog post, making it easier to engage with your audience.

Image Creation and Suggestions
AI can automatically generate or suggest images relevant to your content, making your posts more engaging and visually appealing.

Create Blog Posts from YouTube Videos
Simply input a YouTube video URL, and the AI will generate a complete blog post based on the video's content, saving you time on content creation.

Rewrite Posts from URLs
AI can read and rewrite content from a given URL, providing you with a unique, enhanced version of the original post.

Automatic Post Suggestions Based on Website Structure
The AI analyzes your website’s data and structure to suggest new topics and articles you should consider writing, tailored to your SEO strategy.

Trained on Your Website’s Data
The AI is specifically trained using your website's data, ensuring content suggestions are always relevant and tailored to your site’s needs.

Benefits

Enhanced SEO Performance
AIKCT Engine Chatbot helps improve your website’s SEO by offering optimized keywords, tags, and structured content, increasing your search engine ranking.

Streamlined Content Creation
With automated content generation features, such as rewriting and blog creation from video, the plugin helps reduce the time and effort required for content creation.

Smart Assistant for Admins
This plugin acts as a smart assistant for website administrators, supporting content creation, SEO strategies, and even post-interaction through comment suggestions.

Installation

Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/aikct-engine-chatbot directory or install the plugin directly through the WordPress plugin repository.
Activate the plugin through the 'Plugins' screen in WordPress.
Navigate to the plugin settings to configure and connect your AI engine.

Usage

Use the AI-powered tag generator when writing new posts to automatically optimize tags for better SEO.
Generate comments and images directly from the post editor to enhance audience engagement and make posts more attractive.
Convert YouTube videos into blog posts or rewrite articles by entering the URLs into the respective fields.
Get automatic suggestions for new blog topics based on your website’s existing content and structure.

Support

For any issues, questions, or suggestions, feel free to open an issue on the GitHub repository or contact us through info@aiautotool.com.
License

This plugin is licensed under the GPLv2 or later.
